- **Game name:** {Insert _Game Title_}
- **Title ID:** {Insert Title ID, e.g. _BLUS12345_}
- **Save description:** {Insert a description, e.g. _Game completed, everything unlocked!_}
- **Zip file:** (attach or link the `.zip` file)
